applications.junos:comment: # # Network Basic Input Output System - networking protocol used on # Windows networks session service port #
# # ICMP All Traffic # This can be made to be more restrictive by specifying icmp # type and code. #
# # ICMP Ping. # The echo-reply is allowed upon return #
# # NS-Global (Management protocol for Juniper Networks Firewall/VPN devices) #
# # NS-Global-PRO (Monitoring system for the Juniper Networks Firewall/VPN devices) #
# # PC-anywhere remote control and file transfer protocol #
# # ICMP6 all traffic # This can be made to be more restrictive by specifying icmp6 # type and code. #
# # Real players use this protocol for real time streaming # This was the original protocol for real players. # RTSP is more widely used by real players # but they still support realaudio. #
# # WinFrame protocol (allows users on non-windows machines to run windows applications) #
# # WX Control Connection used by WX-PIM #
# # SNMP AgentX Connection used by WX-ISM #
# # Simple Traversal of User Datagram Protocol (UDP) Through # Network Address Translators (NATs) #

# # 'junos-routing-inbound' represents routing protocols that may # that may need access the trusted network from the untrusted # network. # # Set is intended for a UI to display routing involvement choices. # # NOTE: It is not recommended you use the entire set directly in # a firewall rule and open up firewall to all of these # applications. Also, you should always specify the source # and destination prefixes when using each application. # # NOTE: the contents of this set may grow in future JUNOS versions. #
# # Common Internet File System (cifs) # It runs over netbios and over smb, so construct # an application set to capture it. #
# # Sun RPC nfs-access (Requires nfs and mountd) #
